Zadanie 1:

```{r}

v1 <- (1:20)

assign("tmp",c(7,8,1))

v4 <- rep_len(c(4,6,3),3*10)

v5 <- rep_len(c(4,6,3),9*3)
v5 <- append(v5,c(4,6,4))

v6 <- seq(3,6,0.1)
v6 <- exp(v6)*cos(v6)

v7 <- (rep(2,25) ** (1:25)) /(1:25)

v8 <- seq(10,100,10)
v8 <- sum(v8**3 + 4*v8**2)

v9 <- (1:25)
v9 <- sum((2**v9)/v9 + (3**v9)/(v9**2))

```
